body:
Comment 3: 
Mitchell,

I ran the packer tests under the race detector and found many issues. The error you
reported appears to be consistent with hashmap corruption. We saw some reports identical
to this when khr's new hashmap code landed in Jan (that went into 1.1).

Could I ask you to build a race enabled build of your client, and see what that turns up.

Cheers

Dave
_Labels changed: removed **go1.2maybe**._ _Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
